About

I'm Josh Higgins. I was born and raised in Rochester, Minnesota. I have a beautiful wife and three young kids. I've been mowing since I was a kid. I love the outdoors, so I decided to start my own lawn business, and I have been officially in business since 2018. I take pride and joy in the work I do making lawns look nice and providing exceptional customer service. Please call, email, or text for free estimates.

Services Offered

in Rochester MN
Spring & Fall Cleanup

Dethated, clean up property, bag leaves, and haul away.

Lawn Mowing

Mow, trim, blow grass off sidewalk and driveway.

Snow Removal

Blow Snow, shovel and salt.
